summary: The sword and the spell are your way. And this is your armor.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b] This mod is an old version- please go to                         http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26352 for updates and the standalone version. thank you![/b][/color]







----------------------------------------------SpellSword Cuirass----------------------------------------------------

Version 1.2
Added First Person
Added Gloves
Better Torso


This mod is in its early stages of development, But a lot of things have been ironed out.


---------------------------------
Future plans and WIP\'s
---------------------------------

1. Standalone version/ enchanted versions
2. Custom textures 
3. Female version
4. More versions with different robes





-----------------------
What does it do?
-----------------------

Currently a replacer for the Steel Plate, This adds a model i\'ve been working on for a few days now, styled as i think a battlemage would arm themselves. this is very much a WIP, so expect regular updates.

I wasn\'t satisfied with the choice of armor in-game for characters who use both spells and weapons. It was either cloth with a high Alteration skill, or Heavy armor. Now, you can have the best of both worlds.

A new steel armor with a cloth robe on top, you can now look the part of a true battlemage.


---------------
Installation
---------------

A simple replacer for now.
Add my folder to your skyrim directory, and overwrite any files.
the default directory is Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\nordplate\\

This WILL conflict with any Steel Plate armor replacer you currently have.

-----------------
Permissions
-----------------

You may not upload my files in any other way than the aforementioned purpose, and under no circumstances are you permitted to upload this file to any other domain or website than skyrim.nexusmods.com. 
You may not use any part of this armor for your own mod.


----------
Credits
----------

Huge credits to Nightasy(Nightasy.com), whose tutorials helped me learn the basics of 3D modeling
and for putting up with my constant questions.
My girlfriend for putting up with days of neglect due to modding difficulties.
Bethesda
3DSmax
author: Peterkeller
